docs.text: PlayerService Listens for PlayerAdded and PlayerRemoving events. Constructs a PseudoPlayer for each Player as well as handles Client HTTP Requests. Methods Returns Method PseudoPlayer PlayerService:GetPseudoPlayer(Player player)
